ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

The iOS Simulator MCP Server enables interaction with iOS simulators through a Model Context Protocol. It provides functionalities to retrieve simulator information, control UI interactions (tapping, swiping, text input), inspect UI elements, take screenshots, and integrate with AI agents for visual feedback, primarily used for automated QA testing and validation.

FSB is a Chrome extension that provides AI-powered browser automation through a natural language interface. It supports multiple AI models, analyzes webpage structure, and automates tasks like form filling and navigation. The primary use case is to streamline repetitive browsing tasks and automate workflows for web testing, data entry, research, and more.

SimpMusic is a free and open-source Android music player that utilizes YouTube Music as its backend. It offers a variety of features, including ad-free playback, background play, offline support, synced lyrics, and integration with services like Musixmatch, Spotify, SponsorBlock, and Return YouTube Dislike. The app aims to provide a comprehensive music listening experience by combining the vast library of YouTube Music with the convenience of a dedicated music player.

Flowblade is a multitrack non-linear video editor for Linux that allows users to compose movies from video, audio, and graphics files. It offers a range of editing tools, image compositing features, and audio/video filters. Flowblade supports various media formats and provides advanced features like media generation, batch encoding, and USB shuttle control.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

WinHider is a C++ application designed to hide specific windows from being visible during screen sharing sessions and from the taskbar/taskswitcher. This allows users to maintain privacy and reduce distractions while still being able to interact with the hidden applications. It offers both a graphical user interface (GUI) and a command-line interface (CLI) for managing window visibility.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

ClearURLs is a browser extension that automatically removes tracking elements from URLs, enhancing user privacy while browsing. It supports various browsers and offers features like blocking ad domains, cleaning multiple URLs, preventing tracking injection, and providing a context menu option for copying clean links. The extension aims to provide a cleaner and more private browsing experience by removing unnecessary tracking parameters from web addresses.
